titles.title: Jesus Thy Life Is Mine (difficult to match wor

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Thy life is mine Dwell evermore in me And let me see That nothing can Untwine Thy life from mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy life in me be shown Lord I would henceforth seek To think and speak Thy thoughts Thy words alone No more my own{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy love - Thy joy - Thy peace Continuously impart Unto my heart Fresh springs that never cease But still increase{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The blest reality Of resurrection power Thy Church's dower Life more abundantly Lord give to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy fullest gift O Lord Now at Thy word I claim Through Thy dear name And touch the reapturous chord Of praise forth-poured{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my life is Thine And evermore shall be Hiddedn in Thee For nothing can untwine Thy life from mine{/lang-eng}
